news.Title: [AI Summary] 精材 2025 年 10 月合併營收 7.12 億元，年增 5.62%
news.Content: • 精材 (3374) 公布 2025 年 10 月合併營收達 7.12 億元，較去年同期成長 5.62%。 • 營收數據顯示公司營運穩健，展現成長動能。 根據最新公布的財務數據，半導體封測廠精材 (3374) 於 2025 年 10 月繳出亮眼的營收成績單。公司在 2025 年 11 月 10 日發布的公告中指出，該月份的合併營收總計為 7.12 億元，相較於去年同期的營收數字，呈現了 5.62% 的穩健成長[1]。 此營收數據的公布，對於關注精材營運表現的投資人而言，無疑是一劑強心針。在當前半導體產業景氣波動的環境下，精材能夠維持營收的正向成長，反映了公司在生產製造、客戶訂單以及市場拓展方面的持續努力與成效。具體的營收數字，顯示公司在關鍵的封測領域，依然保有一定的競爭力與市場份額。 儘管新聞資料庫中並未提供更詳細的營收細項分析，例如各產品線的貢獻度或是主要客戶的動態，但單就合併營收的年增率來看，已足以證明精材在 2025 年 10 月的營運狀況是相對樂觀的。這也可能與近期半導體產業的復甦力道、特定應用領域的需求增加，或是精材自身在技術升級、產能優化等方面取得的進展有關。 後續市場將持續關注精材在接下來的月份能否延續此一成長趨勢，並觀察其在第四季及 2025 年全年整體營運表現。任何關於公司未來展望、新訂單動態、或是技術發展的進一步消息，都將是影響股價表現的重要因素。

news.Title: [AI Summary] Xintec Reports October 2025 Consolidated Revenue of NT$712 Million, Up 5.62% Year-on-Year
news.Content:
• Xintec (3374) announced its consolidated revenue for October 2025 reached NT$712 million, marking a 5.62% increase compared to the same period last year.
• The revenue figures indicate stable operations and ongoing growth momentum for the company. Xintec (3374), a semiconductor packaging and testing company, has reported a strong revenue performance for October 2025. According to a company announcement released on November 10, 2025, its consolidated revenue for the month amounted to NT$712 million. This figure represents a healthy year-on-year increase of 5.62% compared to the revenue generated in October of the previous year[1]. The release of these revenue figures is a positive signal for investors closely monitoring Xintec's operational performance. In the current environment of fluctuating semiconductor industry trends, Xintec's ability to sustain revenue growth highlights its continuous efforts and achievements in manufacturing, customer orders, and market expansion. The specific revenue numbers suggest that the company maintains a competitive edge and market share in the crucial field of packaging and testing. While the provided news database does not offer a detailed breakdown of revenue sources, such as contributions from different product lines or dynamics of major clients, the year-on-year growth rate of consolidated revenue alone is sufficient to indicate that Xintec's operational status in October 2025 was relatively optimistic. This could be attributed to the recent recovery in the semiconductor industry, increased demand in specific application areas, or advancements Xintec has made in technological upgrades and production optimization. The market will continue to watch whether Xintec can maintain this growth trend in the coming months and observe its overall operational performance for the fourth quarter and the full year of 2025. Any further news regarding the company's future outlook, new order dynamics, or technological developments will be important factors influencing its stock price.
